attributes.action: keep Myddle (CE controlled) Primary School open.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LEA is proposing to close our school in Sept 2009.  We are a GOOD school in a closeknit community.  We have the Basic Skills Quality Mark, LEA Quality Mark for Emotional Well being, Active Sport Mark, School Travel Plan, Basic Skills Quality Mark for Literacy and Numeracy, FA Charter Mark for football, Artsmark Award (silver) and other initiatives incl Safe Schools.  We have recently developed a brand new ICT suite, Forest Schools area and Food Technology area. We also offer French lessons within the curriculum involving a trip to France in April 2008. With further improvements to our extensive outside area to be completed in the next year Why would the LEA want to take all this away.
